trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Torrington
There were no other sightings in Torrington on or around June 18th 1976
divs: Sighting DetailsI was parking with a girlfriend early morning and I saw a bright light and thought it was the north star but it was 10 o'clock hight in the east. I had a high beam light and just playing around kept flashing it at the light ! This area had few houses and on top of a mountain, we could see car lights and the light got dimmer like it was moving up back into space. The car went by and the light came back even larger ( in the east about the half size of a dime ) bright as white as a star. It never moved for 10 to 15 min's. I kept flashing the high beam light, and the girl I was with started crying and getting upset, then it started to move but it changed from a white light to three lights ,red blue green in a tri. shape.
Summary: It was Like the North Star only in the east.
